attributes.action: ENSURE FINANCIAL PRODUCTS ARE SOLD ON MERIT, NOT BY CELEBRITY ENDORSEMENT
attributes.additional_details:
MANY FINANCIAL PRODUCTS SUCH AS INSURANCE POLICIES ARE ADVERTISED BY FAMOUS CELEBRITIES. I BELIEVE THAT MANY PEOPLE MAY TAKE OUT UNSUITABLE FINANCIAL PRODUCTS BECAUSE THEY ARE PERSUADED BY THE CELEBRITY INVOLVED IN THE ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN.
IF FINANCIAL PRODUCTS WERE ASVERTISED ONLY ON MERIT CUSTOMERS WOULD BE MORE FOCUSED ON THE 'PROS' AND 'CONS' OF THE PRODUCT,AND THEFORE MORE LIKELY TO MAKE THE RIGHT CHOICE FOR THEM.
